  • Contributing to Tahoe-LAFS
  • View page source

Contributing to Tahoe-LAFSÂ¶

As an open source project, Tahoe-LAFS welcomes contributions of many forms.

Examples of contributions include:

  • Code patches
  • Documentation improvements
  • Bug reports
  • Patch reviews

Before authoring or reviewing a patch, please familiarize yourself with the Coding Standards and the Contributor Code of Conduct.
